attributes.action: Prove that when Tony Blair said that the new 'treaty' would not interfere with our taxation was true by not increasing the tax on Red Diesel fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When Tony Blair was reporting back after signing the recent 'treaty' he said that one of his 'Red Lines' was that we would still be in control of our own taxation. As he was against this increase in tax, proved by his request for further derogation it will not needed to be increased to comply with EU regulations..
